channel.title: DaSPOT ((CARIBFLAVA))
channel.description: Exclusive mixes by the GLOBES BEST! - DJ MADLOGIC, DJ BLA5E, DJ MENTION
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hip-Hop, R&B, Soca, Dancehall, Reggaeton, and everything else!!

item.title: Elements of Hip-Hop by DJ Joonie C
item.description:
01• DJ Premier & Bumpy Knuckles - B.A.P
02• Afu-Ra - Soul Assassination
03•Deph Naught ft Royce Da 5 9, Crooked I and Zawles - Lemme Go
04• John Forté - Ninety Nine (Flash the Message)
05• Mac Miller - Party On Fifth Ave
06• Killarmy - Militant
07• 40 Glocc ft Spider Loc and Busta Rhymes - On The Block
08• Blue Sky Black Death - Wing to Wingfeather
09• Redman ft Kool Moe Dee - Rockin Wit Da Best
10•Jean Grae, Jay Electronica, Joell Ortiz - Prowler 2
11• Lloyd Banks/The Alchemist - Bangers
12• Rapsody - Black Girl Jedi
13•Kool G Rap/Prodigy - Where You At?
Check out more music from DJ Joonie C here: http://twitter.com/DJJoonieC http://www.mixcrate.com/djjooniec

Channel Live feat. KRS-One - Mad Izm 08. A Tribe Called Quest - We Can Get Down 09. Raekwon - Incarcerated Scarfaces 10. The Notorious B.I.G. - Who Shot Ya 11. Large Professor - Mad Scientist 12. item.title: And the winner is
item.description: This week is brought to you by DJ Ben Carter...coming straight outta Heilbronn, Germany. 01. One Chance - Gold Digger 02. Jamie Foxx - Yep That's Me 03. Keri Hilson - Turnin' Me On 04. Jeremih feat. 50 Cent - Down On Me 05. Lloyd Banks - Start It Up 06. UGK feat. T.I. - Hit The Block 07. Wiz Khalifa - Black & Yellow 08. Kanye West - Jesus Walks 09. Lil' Wayne - Tha Block Is Hot 10. Fabolous - Body Ya 11. Fat Joe - No Problems 12. Common - Announcement 13. Jay-Z - 99 Problems 14. Fabolous - Tit 4 Tat 15. Chiddy Bang - Good Life 16. Lloyd Banks - Any Girl 17. Audio Push - Act Out 18. Missy Elliott - Let It Bump 19. B.O.B. - Bet I Bust 20. Jay-Z - Big Pimpin' 21. Ying Yang Twins - Halftime 22. Rick Ross - B.M.F. 23. B.O.B. - So So 24. Lil Wayne - Swag Surfin' 25. Barrington Levy - Murderer 26. The Game - It's Okay 27. Tyga - I'm On It 28. Jay-Z - Jockin Jay-Z 29. Kanye West - Monster 30. Red Cafe - I'm Ill 31. Ron Brownz - Drinks On Me 32. Yvette Michele - DJ Keep Playin' - Facebook | http://www.facebook.com/dj.ben.carter - Soundcloud | http://soundcloud.com/ben-carter
